name: DAVIRSI-FLY PTY LTD
about: DAVIRSI-FLY PTY LTD is a premier flight training institution dedicated to nurturing the next generation of aviation professionals. With a strong focus on career-oriented training, our school offers a comprehensive range of programs approved by relevant aviation authorities. Our experienced instructors, many of whom are former airline and military pilots, provide personalized and real-world training. We boast a state-of-the-art facility with advanced aircraft and training devices, ensuring our students receive the highest quality education. Our mission is to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in the aviation industry, and we take pride in our graduates who go on to successful careers with airlines and other aviation entities. At DAVIRSI-FLY, we are committed to delivering excellence in flight training.
services:
